title: FS: T206 Eddie Collins, Titus, Beckley, and couple SL's PRICE CUT
author: Epps

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Eddie Collins, Titus, Beckley, and couple SL's PRICE CUT
posts.post_content:
For sale are a  couple T206 Piedmont 350's. Eddie Collins, Jake Beckley, John Titus, Frank King, and Arch Persons. All prices include shipping. Check and Money Order are preferred. Paypal is accepted but add 2.5%. Email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] or PM me with any questions. 

Eddie Collins- $sold
